title: Juusou Kikou Dancougar Nova
synopsis: In the 22nd century, there are no longer any world wide wars. Instead, small scale wars break out all over the Earth. Meanwhile, a large robot appears who protects the weak. It is called "Dancougar Nova". Some even call it God.
characters: ['Hidaka, Aoi', 'Kamon, Sakuya', 'Tachibana, Kurara', 'Burnette, Johnny', 'Sandman, Klein', 'Cronkite, Isabelle', 'Riruri, Ruu', 'Tanaka', 'Sweeper, Fog', 'Willl']
